**Call Name**
How to call the command:
1. !Bob
2. !Bill

**Usage**
How to call and use the command
1. !Bob {User}
2. !Bill {User} {Message}

**Description**
What the command does:
e.g: Says to {User} "{Bob/Bill} says hi"
